property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, you may choose one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone and tap it. Whenever this creature wins a battle, you may untap it. Awaken - At the start of your turn, if you have 2 or more Flame Commands or creatures that have NEX in their name in the battle zone, flip this creature.

alternate.name: Vermillion Dravita, the Awakened Pressure Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent can"t cast spells. This creature can attack untapped creatures. Triple breaker Release

property.name: Rules
property.value: Annihilating Soul Recall 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose 4 cards from either your opponent"s graveyard, your graveyard, or 4 cards from both graveyards. Put the chosen cards on the bottom of their owner"s deck. For every 4 cards chosen, you may use the following ability.) : Your opponent chooses a card in his hand or battle zone and puts it on the bottom of his deck. Double breaker Awaken - At the end of your turn, if 3 or more of your opponent"s creatures left the battle zone this turn, flip this creature.:Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone gets -5000 power. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) Each of your other creatures in the battle zone gets +5000 power. Quattro breaker Release :Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Your opponent must attack with at least one creature on each of their turns, if able. Whenever a creature is attacking you and isn"t blocked, draw a card. Then, you may cast a spell that has "Shield Trigger" for no cost or summon a creature that has "Shield Trigger" for no cost. Triple breaker

card.name: El Destorade, Dragonic Meteor of Taiga

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) During your turn, when you put this creature or the first creature of the turn into the battle zone, choose one of the following: If you have more than or an equal number of shields as your opponent, look at the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature that costs less than the creature you just put into the battle zone, you may put that creature into the battle zone. If you have fewer shields than your opponent, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Double breaker:Holy Soul:Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you summon this creature or another creature and put that creature into the battle zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put a creature that has "Mana Reburst" from among them into your mana zone tapped, and put a creature that has "Marshall Touch" into the battle zone. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Double breaker Mana Reburst:Kung Fu Soul:Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rebirth Chain (When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature is destroyed, look at the top card of your deck. If that card is a creature that costs less than this creature, you may put it into the battle zone.) Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that has a "Chain" ability gets +1000 power. :Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone for the first time in a turn, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it. Double breaker :Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks and isn"t blocked, you may put a fire psychic creature that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When this creature is destroyed, you may put a non-evolution nature creature from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Dragon, a Giant, and a Samurai creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other (Holy Soul) or (Magic Soul) creatures in the battle zone gets "Blocker". Double breaker :Holy Soul:Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} At the end of each turn, if your opponent broke 2 or more of your shields that turn, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.:Holy Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your (Holy Soul) creatures or one of your (Magic Soul) creatures. Double breaker Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, you may draw up to 2 cards. :Holy Soul:Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you put a creature into the battle zone during your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you summon this creature into the battle zone, you may put one of your creatures that has 7000 power or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, each player discards his hand. No Choice This creature gets +5000 power. Triple breaker :Bloody Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blocker This creature can"t attack. Whenever this creature blocks, choose one of the following: One of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) The blocked creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn.:Evil Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marshall Touch Destroy all creatures that have power 4000 or less. Double breaker :Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent"s creatures that have power 2000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your (Kung Fu Soul) and (Wild Soul) creatures in the battle zone have "Double breaker". :Kung Fu Soul:Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your (Kung Fu Soul) creatures or one of your (Wild Soul) creatures. Double breaker When this creature would leave the battle zone, put this creature into your mana zone instead. Whenever your other (Kung Fu Soul) or (Wild Soul) creatures would leave the battle zone, put it into your mana zone instead. :Kung Fu Soul:Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker This creature can"t be attacked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Double Freeze (Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn"t blocked, you may choose up to 2 of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone and tap them. Those creatures don"t untap at the start of your opponent"s next turn.) Double breaker :Holy Soul:Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Double breaker Solemn Duty This turn, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets "Power Attacker +5000" and breaks an additional shield. Whenever one of your Fire Birds leaves the battle zone, one of your creatures in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures until the end of the turn. :Kung Fu Soul:Wild Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can"t choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.) Awaken - At the end of each turn, if another of your Psychic Creatures awakened that turn, flip this creature. Hyperspatial Psychic

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can"t be blocked. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, he can"t choose this one. (It can still be attacked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chain Holy Field This creature gets "Blocker". :Holy Soul:Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a spell that costs 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. Choose one of the following: Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone Put a Light psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Hyperspatial Psychic

property.value: Blocker Whenever this creature blocks, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chain Holy Field When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead. :Holy Soul:Magic Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 3 cards. Then, your opponent chooses up to 3 of his shields and puts them into his hand. Put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck for each shield your opponent puts into his hand this way.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Look at your opponent"s hand and choose a spell from it. Your opponent discards that spell. Choose one of the following: Put up to 2 psychic creatures that have total cost 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Put a Darkness psychic creature that costs 10 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Hyperspatial Psychic

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your opponent"s turn, if any of your psychic creatures would be returned to your hand by one of your opponent"s spells or the ability of one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone, that creature stays in the battle zone instead. Awaken - At the start of your turn, if you have a creature in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more, flip this creature. Hyperspatial Psychic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Power Attacker Double breaker If any of your psychic creatures would be returned to your hand by one of your opponent"s spells or the ability of one of your opponent"s creatures in the battle zone, that creature stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures that have Double Cross in their names may each cost 1 less to summon. They can"t cost less than 1. Each of your Flame Commands in the battle zone gets "Speed Attacker". :Kung Fu Soul

property.name: Rules
property.value: Awaken - At the end of your turn, if you put 2 or more other creatures into the battle zone this turn, flip this card.Hyperspatial Psychic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your creatures attack, if it"s the third creature to attack this turn, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you haven"t put at least 1 card into your mana zone during your turn, at the end of your turn return this creature to your hand. (This includes your initial mana charge at the start of your turn.) Double breaker

property.value: Blocker This creature can"t attack players. While blocking, this creature gets +2000 power.

Put a Light or Water creature that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Hyperspatial Psychic

Then, put each creature that has "Zeta" in its name from among the revealed cards into your hand and put the rest of the revealed cards into your graveyard.
